full_summary:
=====================================

### Government of Canada Public Notice

**Marketing Services for Veterans Affairs Canada**

#### Issue Date and Tender Status
-------------------------------

* **Publication Date**: October 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 20, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Tender Status**:Expired

#### Tender Details
----------------

This solicitation is for a Request for Proposal (RFP) to provide Veterans Affairs Canada (VAC) with a full range of planning, development, and implementation services for marketing campaigns.

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Tender Type**: Variations or combinations of the above methods
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Scope of Work
-----------------

The Contractor will be required to provide marketing planning, development, and implementation services to support VAC's marketing campaigns from the date of contract award until March 31, 2024. The contract may be extended for up to three one-year periods, ending on March 31, 2027.

#### Contracting Information
-------------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Point of Contact**: Marc-André Leblanc (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email Address**: marc-andre.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Documents
------------

The complete RFP document package can be accessed through the Government of Canada's electronic tendering system at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17878399](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17878399). 

Note that all bids must be submitted electronically through this platform. Interested parties should refer to the RFP document for specific instructions.  Also note that the bid is for marketing CND services, the tender can not be accessed from outside Canada, or others continents.

Reminding that the deadline is 14h00 (EST), on November 20th, 2023. 

Best regards,
[YOUR NAME]
